item.analyzer.name: Soil Analyzer
item.shelter.name: Ladybug Shelter
item.shelter.description: Protects crops in a 6-tile radius from pests.
item.fert_n.name: Nitrogen Booster
item.fert_n.desc: Rich in Nitrogen. Essential for leafy growth.
item.fert_p.name: Phosphorus Booster
item.fert_p.desc: Rich in Phosphorus. Promotes strong roots.
item.fert_k.name: Potassium Booster
item.fert_k.desc: Rich in Potassium. Protects against pests.
item.fert_omni.name: Omni-Nutrient Mix
item.fert_omni.desc: The ultimate soil food. Fully restores NPK.
item.spreader.name: Nutrient Spreader
item.spreader.desc: Automates fertilization. Place a chest with fertilizer above it. Each morning, it spreads 1 fertilizer to a 7x7 area.
